EmailTemplate.subject: Return and check in of Biller and Credit forms
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please note the Biller and Credit Account Applications have been completed for {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Apttus__Account__c}.
The following actions are required:
The Biller/Credit Account Applications (where applicable) have been forwarded to Credit Management for processing.
Once the new accounts have been created, Credit Management will notify Agency Operations and the Seller.
Agency Operations to collate Letter of Intent, account details (from Credit Management) and Questionnaire (from Ready to Trade) to commence build process.
The contract is now available for drafting and submission by the Seller.
Once the contract has been signed and returned by the customer, further notification will be provided to the Seller, Agency Operations and Shared Services.
